greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2^(n-1) - A100462(n).
maple: A100461 := proc(m,n) option remember ; if m = 1 then 2^(n-1) ; else (n-m+1)*floor( (A100461(m-1,n)-1)/(n-m+1) ) ; fi ; end: A100462 := proc(n) A100461(n,n) ; end: A100463 := proc(n) 2^(n-1)-A100462(n) ; end: seq(A100463(n),n=1..100) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 06 2007
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 23 2004
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 06 2007
